jojaplansaheadspringletter.text: Hello @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart could have the summer seeds in stock up to a week in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^I hope to see you this week checking our stock to plan ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
jojaplansaheadsummerletter.text: Hello @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart could have the fall seeds in stock up to a week in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^I hope to see you this week checking our stock to plan ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
jojaplansaheadwinterletter.text: Hello @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart could have the spring seeds in stock up to a week in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^I hope to see you this week checking our stock to plan ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
